page.title: 01Summary of Donisthorpe Area.
page.content: The area around Donisthorpe consists mainly of farmland although there are several small villages too. The area we have to cover includes Acresford, Netherseal,the south end of Overseal and Donisthorpe.There are several farms spread about the area.Across our block runs the route of the old Ashby Canal,also a disused railway track.The houses in our area are made of brick due to the availability of raw materials which are needed at the nearby brick factory. There are coal mines in the area which unite the villages into a mining community.These mines employ a high percentage of the males.There are many clubs and social activities organized which provide entertainment for all ages.
